# Changelog

All notable changes to ezMPI will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- Initial public release of ezMPI
- MPI processing pool implementation
- Comprehensive test suite (unit, integration, performance tests)
- CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
- Documentation with MkDocs

### Changed
- N/A

### Deprecated
- N/A

### Removed
- N/A

### Fixed
- N/A

### Security
- N/A

## [0.1.0] - 2024-01-19

### Added
- Initial release
- MPIPool class for parallel task processing
- Support for dill serialization (optional)
- Context manager support
- Comprehensive test coverage
- Documentation

[Unreleased]: https://github.com/minaskar/ezmpi/compare/v0.1.0...HEAD
[0.1.0]: https://github.com/minaskar/ezmpi/releases/tag/v0.1.0
